$description:
| What does this do? | Ensures modern authentication for SharePoint applications is required; external content sharing is restricted; SharePoint guest users cannot share items they don't own; SharePoint external sharing is managed through domain whitelist/blacklists; OneDrive sync is restricted for unmanaged devices. |
| Why should you use this? | Having these settings reduces the chances of data exfiltration in your organization. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will only be able to share content with guests from organizationally approved list of partner organizations/domains; users will only be able to synchronize on devices joined to allowed AD domains. |
| Learn more | [Turn external sharing off](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/turn-external-sharing-on-or-off) [Sharepoint Online](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/sharepoint-online/set-spotenant?view=sharepoint-ps) [Allow syncing only on specific domains](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/allow-syncing-only-on-specific-domains) |
